meanings.sent1: The balloon floated gassily into the sky.
meanings.sent2: The car moved gassily through the foggy streets.
meanings.sent3: The ghostly figure moved gassily through the walls, giving everyone a spooky surprise.
meanings.sent4: The morning mist hung gassily over the meadow, creating an ethereal atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The scent of fresh bread wafted gassily from the bakery, enticing passersby.

meanings.sent1: The gassily stove kept the room warm during the winter.
meanings.sent2: The old car had a gassily smell coming from the exhaust.
meanings.sent3: The gassily skunk made everyone run away with its strong odor.
meanings.sent4: The gassily volcano erupted, spewing ash and lava into the air.
meanings.sent5: The gassily flower released a sweet fragrance into the garden.

meanings.sent1: The gassily bubbles rose to the surface of the fizzy drink.
meanings.sent2: The gassily balloon slowly deflated after the party.
meanings.sent3: The gassily soda can made a loud pop when opened.
meanings.sent4: The gassily cloud expanded in the sky, signaling an approaching storm.
meanings.sent5: The gassily planet had a thick atmosphere of various gases.
